tests package

Submodules

tests.test_data_analysis module

Unit tests for the data_analysis module.

class tests.test_data_analysis.TestAvgMeasurement(methodName='runTest')[source]

Bases: TestCase

test_avg_measurement(mock_measurement)[source]

Test for the avg_measurement function.

Verifies a simple case by mocking a Measurement model and select method. It mocks a list of measurements with specific values. The function is called with a station ID, and the expected result is compared with the actual result.

test_avg_measurement_empty(mock_measurement)[source]

Test the ‘avg_measurement’ function when there are no measurements.

This test case verifies that the ‘avg_measurement’ function returns 0.0 when there are no measurements available.

Parameters:

mock_measurement – Mock object representing the patched ‘Measurement.select’ method.

test_avg_measurement_single_measurement(mock_measurement)[source]

Test the ‘avg_measurement’ function with a single measurement.

This test case verifies that the ‘avg_measurement’ function returns the correct average value when there is only one measurement available.

Parameters:

mock_measurement – Mock object representing the patched ‘Measurement.select’ method.

class tests.test_data_analysis.TestHighestMeasurement(methodName='runTest')[source]

Bases: TestCase

test_highest_measurement(mock_select)[source]

Test for the highest_measurement function.

Verifies a simple case by mocking a Measurement model and select method. It defines a mock measurement with specific value and date. Function is called with a station ID and results are compared.

class tests.test_data_analysis.TestLowestMeasurement(methodName='runTest')[source]

Bases: TestCase

test_lowest_measurement(mock_select)[source]

Test for the lowest_measurement function.

Verifies a simple case by mocking a Measurement model and select method. It defines a mock measurement with specific value and date. Function is called with a station ID and results are compared.

tests.test_localize module

class tests.test_localize.TestCheckServer(methodName='runTest')[source]

Bases: TestCase

test_connection_error(mock_head)[source]

Test the ‘check_server’ function when a ConnectionError occurs.

This test case verifies that the ‘check_server’ function returns False when a ConnectionError is raised.

Parameters:

mock_head – Mock object representing the patched ‘requests.head’ function.

test_server_available(mock_head)[source]

Test the ‘check_server’ function when the server is available.

This test case verifies that the ‘check_server’ function returns True when the server responds status code 200.

Parameters:

mock_head – Mock object representing the patched ‘requests.head’ function.

test_server_unavailable(mock_head)[source]

Test the ‘check_server’ function when the server is unavailable.

This test case verifies that the ‘check_server’ function returns False when the server responds status code other than 200.

Parameters:

mock_head – Mock object representing the patched ‘requests.head’ function.
